entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Fort Albany
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:07 a.m. EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -16.1Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Moosonee Airport 9:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -16.1°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 84 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -18.2°C
Wind: ENE 24 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of light snow late this afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 50 this morning then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 late this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow changing to ice pellets or snow this evening then to light snow overnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 before morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 late in the morning. High zero with temperature falling to minus 5 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
